headline: Is Qualcomm Inc (QCOM) the Top Growth Stock in David Tepper’s Portfolio?
summary: We recently published a list of Top 10 Growth Stocks in David Tepper’s Portfolio. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Qualcomm Inc (NASDAQ:QCOM) stands against other top growth stocks in David Tepper’s Portfolio. headline: I'm Betting On Tan's Intel For A Trade In 2025 - Initiating With A Buy
summary: Intel's new CEO, Lip-Bu Tan, is driving efficiency, innovation, and potential mergers to spark a stock surge. See why we are bullish on INTC stock.
